item.description: Contact Email: spphd@nus.edu.sg Faculty webpage: https://lkyspp.nus.edu.sg/our-people/faculty/han-dan Office address: Â Lee Kuan Yew School of Public Policy
Publications Powell, David, Dan Han, Jevay Grooms, and Rosalie Liccardo Pacula.
Working Papers Workload and Team Performance in Health Care: Evidence from Kenya, with Emma Clarke-Deelder and Margaret McConnell

Courses taught at the Lee Kuan Yew School of Public Policy Core PP5401 Policy Challenges, 2021-2023 PP5110A Policy Analysis Exercise (MPP Capstone), 2024 & 2025 Electives PP5278 Health Economics and Public Policy, 2021-present PP5166 Globalization, Health, and Human Development, 2024-present PP5105 Cost-Benefit Analysis in Public Policy, 2022 & 2023
